caption:
💥 $285,000 WON for Our Client 💥

Our client suffered a serious back injury after tripping and falling against a metal pool handrail at her apartment complex. The cause? Chairs that were carelessly placed near the pool by property management.

We argued that the owners and managers of the complex failed in their duty to keep the pool area safe — and we held them accountable.

👉 If you’ve been injured due to unsafe property conditions, you don’t have to fight alone.
📞 DM us or call for a free consultation. Let’s talk about your rights.
